snippet.title: 004 EXPENDABLE - Mono-stick shooter | DREAMVERSE
snippet.description:
This is a video about a couple of things, but it's mostly about Expendable for the Sega Dreamcast. 
Before we had two analog sticks to play our dual-stick shooters with, Rage Software made something similliar. With one analog stick. It's a struggle.

'Dreamverse' is about chronologically talking about every European and North American released game for SEGAs last console. 

Apologies for sometimes butchering the japanese language (and other languages).

Music by
Oculus_Official - "Voyager"
https://youtu.be/LOaqeN3rwDU

misterE - "park bench"
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z71n9VJHPIs

Great interview with Ian Moran, co-founder of Rage Software
http://codetapper.com/amiga/interviews/ian-moran/

Eurofighter Typhoon gameplay by Lt._Keller
https://youtu.be/RxSAbJlPYhU

War of the Worlds gameplay by ShadowOfCygnus
https://youtu.be/OJFIBdcKDEo
